lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Kurama
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Kurama
[00:00.000] 编曲 : RoyalBoyBrazy
[00:00.000]Maybe, maybe I fall for you cause
[00:01.693]Lately, lately you came into my heart
[00:05.444]It won't be a scar
[00:08.199]Wake up, it's already afternoon
[00:10.443]Speed up, we were in honeymoon
[00:13.444]I've been reading love cartoon
[00:16.444]Nobody on the road
[00:17.443]Cause I'm freak enough
[00:18.693]Cliffs towered above
[00:19.943]Life had shut me up (｡•́‸ •̀｡)
[00:25.693]Prod by RoyalBoyBrazy
[00:28.193]Mix&Mastered by 垃圾超市
[00:31.193]Cover art封面：Kurama
[00:33.694]Maybe...
[00:37.693]we don't belong here
[00:39.443]Lately...
[00:45.193]Maybe, maybe I fall for you cause
[00:48.193]Lately, lately you came into my heart
[00:52.695]It won't be a scar
[00:56.444]Wake up, it's already afternoon
[00:59.443]Speed up, we were in honeymoon
[01:02.693](Don't sleep in class Kurama!)
[01:04.194]I've been reading love cartoon
[01:07.693]Nobody on the road
[01:09.444]Cause I'm freak enough
[01:10.694]Cliffs towered above
[01:12.194]Life had shut me up
[01:15.444]But I don't care
[01:17.946]I got 2D friends
[01:19.443]It's like deja-vu
[01:20.694]when I stay with you
[01:21.943]Your eyes are turning blue
[01:23.444]People can't see you
[01:26.443]they can't see you
[01:30.193]Maybe...
[01:34.194]We don't belong here
[01:35.944]Baby...
[01:39.694]Ran away with me there
[01:41.694]Maybe, maybe I fall for you cause
[01:44.694]Lately, lately you came into my heart
[01:49.194]It won't be a scar
[01:52.694]Wake up, it's already afternoon
[01:55.944]Speed up, we were in honeymoon
[01:59.444](Don't sleep in class Kurama!)
[02:00.944]I've been reading love cartoon
[02:04.194]If it's always been like this
[02:07.194]Please let me stucking in my dream
[02:09.943]Smothered me with your kisses
[02:12.943]Just let me die in my dream
[02:15.694]We can do the party and getting naughty
[02:18.443]We can have a grammy or something
[02:21.443]No more endless loneliness waiting for me
[02:24.193]Just let me die in my dream
[02:26.944]Maybe we don't belong here
[02:32.193]Baby ran away with me there
[02:39.694](•ૢ⚈͒⌄⚈͒•ૢ)
